Class MainApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
MainApplication
public class MainApplication extends javafx.application.Application
The main application for setting up the game screen, as well as starting the game logics.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lukas Bumüller, Julius Großmann, Leonard Fritz und Tom Zehle

    • generateGame

      public javafx.scene.Scene generateGame()
      Generates the gamefields. Utilizes the bitmap for generating special fields, such as the arable fields. Sets up the collision checker instance. All visual objects are generated here.
      Returns:
      scene
